greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A000730(7*n).
reference: G. E. Andrews and B. C. Berndt, Ramanujan's lost notebook, Part III, Springer, New York, 2012, See p. 191.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) = (-1)^j mod 7 if n = j*(3*j - 1)/2 for all j in Z; otherwise a(n) = 0 mod 7.
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Feb 25 2017
